name: Visual Inspection of Light Pole Location setout
Alignment with approved drawings and site plan
All testing and measuring equipment calibration certificates valid
Free from vegetation, debris, and obstructions
Review of Concrete, and Reinforcement steel
Compliance with IFC Drawings, Specifications and Standards
All reinforcing bars shall be Grade 500MPa to AS/NZS 4671
All concrete construction shall be in accordance with NZS3109 and IFC Drawings
Embeded threaded rods, nuts and washers shall all be M16, grade 8.8
Delivery Dockets supplied for each delivery/Pour
Visual Inspection of each footing location
Check that depth & dimensions comply with IFC Drawings
Bottom of foundation pad must be at least 350mm below ground level
Compacted hardfill pad 200mm thick of Gap40 under footing locations
Test acceptance to be a clegg test recorded to min of 24.
Visual inspection of formwork and steel bar placement, cover and tying, alignment and cleanliness
75mm Cover is maintained to ground and all formwork
Compliance with IFC drawings; no gaps or damage and formwork set for finished level to be minimum of 20mm above finished ground level
Prepour Inspection completed for each pour
Visual inspection of all embedded items before and following pouring
Positioning of anchor bolts or inserts is as per approved IFC Drawings
Hold Down Bolts dimensional check - min. 30mm from underside of plate to top of foundation & 220mm from embeded plate to top of threaded rod
Installed electrical ducting to have a 32mm duct for earthing & 2x 50mm ducts with 400mm radius extending 800mm below the finished foundation and 200mm above the foundation
Verify Certified Batching Plant is used
Concrete strength to be min of 25MPa
Proper compaction of poured concrete, no segregation or honeycombing
Tests Taken in accordance with NZS3112.2
Compression test on cylinders taken in accordance with NZS3112.2
Meets and exceeds 25MPa at 28 day test
Visual Inspection of curing of concrete
Check position and alignment of foundation
Dimensional checks & compliance with tolerance in drawings
Visual Inspection of surface for cracks, voids, and finish quality
No visible defects or honeycombing for each foundation
Comprehensive inspection of all elements relating to the Light Pole Foundations
Compliance with IFC drawings and specifications
Verify all Light Pole Foundations meet design and functional requirements
Light Pole Foundations ready for subsequent construction activities
Each Non-Conformance Reported, Rectified & Closed Out
Development of Punchlist with Client and Contractor Representative
Punch List closed out in a timely mannor
On completion of the Light Pole foundations:
Submission of all test results, ITC's and any as-built drawings
